problem_text_cn: 2018年最强台风“山竹”9月16日上午11时登陆广东深圳,造成巨大的经济损失.如图台风“山竹”把一棵大树在离地面5m处折断,树顶落在离树根12m处,则大树在折断前高为()
problem_text_en: The strongest typhoon "Mangosteen" N_0 in N_1 landed in Shenzhen, Guangdong at N_3 on the morning of N_2, causing huge economic losses. As shown in the figure, typhoon "Mangosteen" broke a large tree N_4 from the ground, and the top of the tree fell to the root of the tree. At N_5, the height of the tree before breaking is ()
